Body:
"""Failing test of ``gen_xrf_spectrum``: invalid types of parameter ``element_line_groups``"""
element_groups = None
spectrum_expected = np.zeros(shape=(4096,), dtype=float)
spectrum, xx = gen_xrf_spectrum(element_groups, incident_energy=12.0)
npt.assert_array_equal(spectrum, spectrum_expected, err_msg=
    'Values in the spectrum array are not all zeros')
with pytest.raises(RuntimeError, match=
    "Parameter 'element_line_groups' has invalid type"):
    gen_xrf_spectrum([1, 2, 3], incident_energy=12.0)
